scripts.test: npm-run-all test-tsd test-storage3-express test-storage4-express test-koa1 test-koa2
scripts.test-storage3-express: npm install --no-save leancloud-storage@3 && mocha test --timeout 8000 test/express
scripts.test-storage4-express: npm install --no-save leancloud-storage@4 && mocha test --timeout 8000 test/express
scripts.test-koa1: npm install --no-save koa@1 koa-bodyparser@2 && env FRAMEWORK=koa KOA_VER=1 mocha test --timeout 8000 test/koa
scripts.test-koa2: npm install --no-save koa@2 koa-bodyparser@4 && env FRAMEWORK=koa KOA_VER=2 mocha test --timeout 8000 test/koa
